title: Broly46
author: Broly46
content: Recently got to know a friend of mine passed away half a year ago from the gossip, I thought the chat is just a joke or mistaken with another person with same name, in my best guess, there is no chance at all, I still texting with the deceased frequently over the mobile app until the end of 2022, we are so close we basically talk about all things, I also tell him about bitcoin which he seem to be listening, I also think he like to talk about Jesus everyday and all the post on his social media wall is all about Jesus, and he is a devoted to Jesus and such, however I remember to tell him to stop taking the JABS, because I take NO JAB, totally zero JABS, but he took every damn jab included all the booster JABS, I think there is a total of four jabs he took so he can got to save his job, I'm not saying the JAB kill him, but it was a shockwave to me, I was told he was declared commit suicide on news, that he is sleeping and never wake up again since no wound or bleeding, until his parent found him breathless and realize he passed while sleeping, it is too spooky to me, to my best knowledge I highly suspect it is another story.That is as much I would expose, I would like to keep the rest of the juicy detail confidential for some reason. I would not entertain request.btw he is very hardworking guy, and yes he is still a complete virgin and no single girl want to date him or approach him, a very typical nerd engineer guy who did very well in school.That remind me of the last recession where I see the same incident occuring, I'm not predicting anything btw.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Life is filled with mysteries and uncertainties because the person you might see today you may not see them tomorrow that is why we that are living we should try to live a righteous life, a life that will please our creator.Actually to my believe, nothing like death is just a place that is more better than earth, a place were you have no access to your wealth and belongings.That's why whatever thing we are fighting for today is just for the flesh and not for the soul, no matter how much you are brilliant on your course of study one day everyone certainly has to leave. It's time to love and embrace Jesus your Maker.However, I don't think this post belong here move it to the off-topic section.

comments.author: Broly46
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on May 07, 2023, 04:58:06 PMLife is filled with mysteries and uncertainties... False, there is certainty, such as sun always rise from east and sunset to the west. Life is also a certainty because it does indeed existed and just as real as it is.Quote...nothing like death is just a place that is more better than earth...that is some extreme opinion on some flaw logic, lol, no way it was better.Quote...embrace Jesus your Maker.obviously it is a teaching I got from stock market, embrace your boss, the company is full of values, and worth to die for. QuoteHowever, I don't think this post belong here move it to the off-topic section.Yup, agreed. I would move it to some where else.

I would not entertain request.btw he is very hardworking guy, and yes he is still a complete virgin and no single girl want to date him or approach him, a very typical nerd engineer guy who did very well in school.That remind me of the last recession where I see the same incident occuring, I'm not predicting anything btw.I recently visited Austria and if you are talking about the vaccine calling the doses JABS,I am afraid you may be right.I saw in Austria people talking about such a high number of deaths from heart attacks that they had never heard before and honestly in my view this cannot be a coincidence,Austria,specifically Vienna is a place I travel often for work and since the vaccine things have precipitated for the worse,people are not happy and are suffering a lot of unexplained deaths which are happening exactly after people made the vaccine doses in order to enter restaurants,McDonalds,super markets like Billa,Lydl and Spar and all other facilities but which are now resulting in an increased fatality rate.Some may say it is just a coincidence but for me it is absolutely not such a thing.Anyway who am I to be telling this to WHO.In fact WHO deceived us all,the vaccines did nothing to stop spread the virus,the virus just did it's journey and it is now like a normal flu.

comments.author: Broly46
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on May 08, 2023, 09:01:50 AM...the doses JABS,I am afraid you may be right......deaths from heart attacks that......people are not happy and are...suffering a lot of unexplained deaths......increased fatality rate...Wild speculation can never be aacepted to answer a sudden death such as this. Of course it would be much more complicated, it is a victimless crime, nobody should be blamed for it, because there can never be solid proof to blame anything, of course it might be his own fault for taking the jabs, also it is likely linked to habit too where he is living unhealthy lifestyle which could be the cause. Btw I do not like the jab, it is just my personal preference, I also know very well why he would take the jab despite all advices, and doubt against it, it is humiliating if you are not taking the jab when all your peer are taking them all, it is the peer pressure btw.btw taking four jabs within a year is something I can never imagine, it is basically a time bomb to me. Quote....Anyway who am I to be telling this to WHO...And you know what, corporate can never be sued for damages, they have buyout every loophole you could imagine. For the worse, everyone around you would be very supportive of taking jabs, your parent even go as far as name calling you and blame you if you refuse to take the jab, it is insane mental gymnastics going on. But what you know it set a very bad precedent, it is legally to euthanize with jab I would imagine, there have to be some funny thing in the jab, that is responsible for it.Btw, it is always tiring to convince anyone, although I had try to stop them once, but there is nothing else could do to stop people from doing their deed, and many such cases. Yup, it remind me of the exact same accident in the past, it is a mistake, it seem people never learn.

comments.author: Ebede
comments.body: That is why we need to value our life and remember that we own nothing on earth, I don't make troubles because I know that have nothing to gives us as human, we need to be doing good knowing that we does not own life and it is possible that we can die from sleep at any moment.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: If I have to bring Bible to this I will have to because that's were all the truthfulness stays, like the Bible says in  Ecclesiastes 1 vs 2-8 it makes us to understand that all is vanity, we will lose everything we all have some day because they are all vanity upon vanity, I have to come in a conclusion with this statement because that's the nature of life and we can't cheat nature, anything that has a beginning also have an end, if nothing have an end it will reach the extent that the planet Earth will not contain trillions of people, so sorry mate I feel your pains, and I know-how it feels because I have also been in your condition when I lost my grandma.

The cause of his death is also strange because he died in his sleep. This is a clear indication that death is unpredictable. That is why we should ensure that we assist those we can and contribute positively to our family and community because we will be remembered for our good works.Quote from: swogerino on May 08, 2023, 09:01:50 AMI recently visited Austria and if you are talking about the vaccine calling the doses JABS,I am afraid you may be right.I saw in Austria people talking about such a high number of deaths from heart attacks that they had never heard before and honestly in my view this cannot be a coincidence,Austria,specifically Vienna is a place I travel often for work and since the vaccine things have precipitated for the worse,people are not happy and are suffering a lot of unexplained deaths which are happening exactly after people made the vaccine doses in order to enter restaurants,McDonalds,super markets like Billa,Lydl and Spar and all other facilities but which are now resulting in an increased fatality rate.We are all aware that most of these vaccines were hurriedly produced because of the emergency of the Covid 19 pandemic. I will not be surprised if some of these deaths are because of these substandard vaccines. But until there is formal research on the cause of these deaths, we will just keep speculating on the real cause.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Talking about the jabs back then and the pressure for it and all the news and restrictions to travel if you don't take it, I think all seem to have subsided now and quite alot of people didn't take it and they are surviving. Sometimes we should really give ourselves some break from the fears that are inhibited inside of us and be rational. Somethings will actually happen whether we do something about them or not and death is inevitable.
